LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Base.description:
AGBs41，IceFox，It's one of the favorite Sydaily crystal weapons of the Ferian: Elegant design, small and lightweight at the same time to ensure that the effective killing of alien monsters！ 

It carries two pure Sydaily Crystal. It must be connected with the crystal on the head of Ferian. 
Due to possible misfires, the effective range and power of all Sydaily crystal weapons are limited to a certain range. And the pulse she emits dissipates as soon as it touches the entity. 

When the trigger is pulled, the atomic firing pin will strike the crystal rapidly, passing the projection of another crystal and destroying the target in an instant ~ 
【In order to prevent the initial unstable pulse from accidentally injuring itself.It can't fire at close range!】 
（The initial unstable pulse of the projection converts some of the dust in the air. They drift toward the planet's near Magnetic Poles, but they will return to their original shape after a while. It'll be a beautiful process!）
